availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: Louis S. B. de Crety (Louisville, Kentucky, French teacher and liquor dealer)

body.p: Louisville, Kentucky, French teacher and liquor dealer. Native of France. French teacher at Milwaukee Female College in Milwaukee, Wisconsin, in 1855. Liquor dealer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1861. Liquor dealer in Louisville, Kentucky, in 1862. Laborer in Louisville in 1863.

ab.bibl:
Internal Revenue Assessment Lists for Kentucky, 1862-1866 NARA RG 58, Microfilm Series M768, Roll 11, Jefferson County, Kentucky, 1862.
Consolidated Lists of Civil War Draft Registration Records, Records of the Provost Marshal General's Bureau (Civil War), NARA RG 110, Jefferson County, KY, July 1863, p. 57.
